thread.section_title: Bundle Stars Reviews | Customer Service Reviews of Bundle Stars | www.bundlestars.com | 34 of 918
thread.title: Customer

author: Customer
title: Customer
text:
The sales are ok from time to time but usually no "lowest price ever" for the games.
The bundles feel a bit redundant. In the "real" bundles the games were mostly already in other bundles on other sites. The other so called bundles where you get a game and all/some of its DLCs, well, that's not a bundle imho.
Nevertheless, if you find something interesting, the whole order process works fast and reliable.
